snippet: Herbalife's shares plunged more than 20 percent on Tuesday, despite reporting strong earnings, after the hedge fund manager David Einhorn asked a critical question during a conference call with analysts.
abstract: Herbalife's shares plunged more than 20 percent on Tuesday, despite reporting strong earnings, after the hedge fund manager David Einhorn asked a critical question during a conference call with analysts.

byline.original: By MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

headline.main: Einhorn Questions Prompt Selloff at Herbalife
